entities.name: SonicJS AI
entities.description: Modern, TypeScript-first headless CMS built for Cloudflare's edge platform with Hono.js

entities.name: Technology Stack
entities.description: Hono.js framework, Cloudflare Workers, D1 database, R2 storage, TypeScript, HTMX, Drizzle ORM

observations.content: Project follows 6-stage development plan. Stages 1-5 completed (Foundation, Authentication, Content Management, Media Handling, Plugin Framework). Stage 6 (Advanced Features) is next.
Uses developer-centric approach with configuration over UI. AI-friendly architecture with clean code patterns and comprehensive documentation.

Core technologies: Hono.js web framework, Cloudflare Workers runtime, D1 SQLite database, R2 object storage, TypeScript with strict mode, HTMX for admin interface, Drizzle ORM for database operations, Vitest for unit testing, Playwright for E2E testing.
Features complete content management with collections, versioning, media library, JWT authentication with RBAC (admin/editor/author/viewer roles), plugin architecture, and template system.
Development workflow: Plan with todos, use TodoWrite tool extensively, follow existing code patterns, run tests with npm test and npm run test:e2e, build with npm run build.
Key file locations: src/routes/ for API endpoints, src/templates/ for HTML templates, src/db/schema.ts for database schema, src/plugins/ for plugin system, docs/ for comprehensive documentation.
Prefers memory stored in shared project location (docs/ai/claude-memory.json) so other developers can benefit from accumulated context.
